title: zac bug?
body: everytime when i play zac my ping rises with 400 , i played a game with zac and i hade 442 ping then morderkaiser with a 42 ping then zac again with 442 ping? is this purpose or what ?

replies.body: Sauerkraut and Bratwurst and Lederhosen we alle live in Bavaria Bruder!
Got similar problems with Zac. Played ranked with him everytime i pressed E my ping goes up to 300ms normal it is at 40-50ms.....
